website_summaries.verdict: These test strips accurately predict ovulation and are affordable for the amount you get in each pack.
cons: Buyers note that it is important to test until the test line is as dark or darker than the control line as most will see two lines on these test strips every time

customer_reviews.title: My Lucky Strips 🍼
customer_reviews.text: My periods were really irregular, ranging from 28-35 day cycles and after a few months of using Clear Blue Ovulation I couldn't afford them anymore. Then I found these and they are so easy to use, I was able to use two a day, morning and evening, for as long as it took (without sweating the cost) to determine my LH surge. It was clear the night I had my first positive result, woke my husband up and am now 5 weeks pregnant!! Gave them to my best friend who is also ttc cause they're now the "Lucky Strips"
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: It’s a big no for me. Even my husband tested positive m, but I didn’t.
customer_reviews.text: ***review updated*** I spoke way too soon. PATIENCE IS KEY! According to my app, I was supposed to ovulate 6 days ago. I wanted to give up and thought I wasn’t ovulating. I decided to keep on trying to test up until I have my next period. And voila! I finally tested positive on the 6th day after my app said I was to ovulated. The first test strip shows negative on the day I was supposed to ovulate. The other two strips are of me testing today and actually repeated the test. It works!!! Now I will try to Time conception and will update you all!
customer_reviews.author: Little Ms. Alu

customer_reviews.title: False positives
customer_reviews.text: I started using these right after AF and only had two days of negative results before getting my first positive. I thought maybe I just was ovulating early but then had positive result for the next 7 days! I thought something was wrong with me until I tried another brand and it was negative. I saw other people have had the same thing happen and others have had success so maybe it’s just bad batches, but whichever it is I won’t be chancing using them again.
customer_reviews.author: Knorr

customer_reviews.title: I don't think I would've gotten pregnant without them!
customer_reviews.text: I got off birth control a couple months ago. I hadn't gotten a period yet and had absolutely no clue if/when I was ovulating. I would check every few days here and there with these strips, which were nonstop negative. I randomly checked one morning, after not testing for about 5 days, and it was a STRONG positive. I was shocked. 2 weeks later I got my positive pregnancy test. I honestly know I wouldn't have gotten pregnant without these strips, because I was shooting in the dark guessing when I was ovulating prior to this. They work, they're cheap, and I would highly recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: leif summers

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Did their job!! I have been TTC for 7+ YRS and after using this box for 3 months and getting positive ovulation tests we are finally pregnant. These tests were so much cheaper than the store bought tests and easy to use. I had never had a positive ovulation test before with the store bought ones. The HCG tests work great too.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Del Rio

customer_reviews.title: These definitely work. Read instructions
customer_reviews.text: I have PCOS and after a year and a half of trying and being told to keep trying, I decided to buy these to help me find out when I ovulate. Haven’t had a period in about six months but the first time I ovulate I conceived. So far I’m six weeks along now. Worth the buy ladies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the large quantity.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried the fancy digital tests, and these at the same time. These were always more accurate. These would show positive the same days as the expensive one's and go negative a few days later like you would expect. Where as the digital just kept saying high. So I decided no more digital. I will continue to buy these each time I run out. I love that you get a huge box of 50. They are easy to use and easy to read. Also a great price. Only recommendation is add in a few a few pregnancy test. Either way. I love this product. Very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Fallen angel

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing works!!!! I was so obsessed with checking my ovulation and hormone levels that I did one test every day and close to the days I believed where my most fertile ones I did 2 tests one in the morning and in the afternoon, This amazing things were able to predict my most fertile days and got pregnant within a month from when I purchased this product. My husband and I were trying but didn't know if we were trying on my most fertile days so this definitely helped!
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are using the app Natural Cycles as birth control and they recommend ovulation tests the week of fertility. These have been accurate every time in partnership with the basal body temperature chart. I highly recommend this product, and also the method of birth control using an app like Natural Cycles, or Daysey.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Work very well. Read directions!
customer_reviews.text: These work just as they say they will. I read reviews that say differently but just like the package says, there will be a positive test for 1-2 days in your cycle (if you’re healthy) and then ovulation occurs within 24-48 of that, then the LH levels drop and there will be negative tests after that. Read the directions. If they don’t work it’s most likely a user error or possibly that one’s cycle is off. These have helped me not get pregnant without having to use other birth control methods that have many dangerous side effects. Have been using for a month and will continue using them to track my pattern of ovulation.
customer_reviews.author: Trinity

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, and good quantity for the price. One tip if you are tracking ovulation to get pregant is to keep a notebook and tape these in with the date and time of day after you use them. It is neat to see the progression towards ovulation and then away so you can pinpoint your fertile window. Unfortunately I was unable to conceive and am now pursuing assistance with a fertility specialist and medications. But these are a great first step to help track your ovulation cycle.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Pregnant after first month using these.
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered February 2nd. According to these tests I ovulted February 6th/7th. Intimate on the 6th, and here I am pregnant on February 21st. So yea, they work 😁
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: All tests false positive
customer_reviews.text: These do not work. All tests show up with 2 dark lines. I even tested my husband's pee and it was a positive. Don't waste your money and go with another company.
customer_reviews.author: Anne P.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read/Use
customer_reviews.text: Update!! This box was a bad batch!!! I got three different positives all a week a apart from each other and I track bbt so I know my body didn’t try to ovulate 3 different times!! So disappointed. Nearly every test has been super high compared to my last box I had normal highs & lows and only one peak. These strips are a game changer and a must have to track ovulation. It is always spot on when I get my LH peak (usually the same time every month) and its a quick test to take. With there being so many, I don't feel wasteful testing 2x a day around my peak.
customer_reviews.author: Erica S.

customer_reviews.title: TTC and so grateful that these are cheap AND work
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have been TTC for about a year. I lost an ovary in early adulthood due to a fast-growing cyst, so getting pregnant has been a lot more complicated than expected. There was a question of ovulation timing, and I was not excited to spend ungodly amounts of money to track ovulation. I bought a big box of these, and they're right on the money every time. My LH surge is clear as day and I (given my obsessive personality) I am able to test as many times as I want and not feel like I'm throwing money down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: These never showed when I was ovulating, only when I was pregnant.
customer_reviews.text: These didn't really work for me. I would use consistently at the same time every day and I never got the bright pink "LH surge" that I was expecting. This was very frustrating as I have irregular cycles and was hoping these would help. The only time they were positive was when I was actually pregnant. For both of my pregnancies, the strips were very dark pink and very positive for days...then I took a pregnancy test and turns out I was pregnant. SO not so helpful for ovulation prediction, but at least they provided some data. Overall temperature tracking has been the most accurate way of ovulation prediction for me so far.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy S. Pile

customer_reviews.title: Worthwhile purchase
customer_reviews.text: Well written instructions, easy to use, fairly priced. It’s important to note that, unlike HCG, LH is present in the body (both male and female), to some degree, at all times. So, a faint line in the test area indicates there is LH in the urine, but likely not a surge consistent with pre-ovulatory levels. However, this leaves a little bit of interpretation up to the user. Thus, it is important to triangulate these results with other data (such as basal body temperature and cervical secretions) in order to achieve an accurate understanding of when you are ovulating.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: R
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for me since my cycle its all over the place and we were looking to get pregnant within the second month i was pregnat. It helped a lot like I said sometimes I wouldn't even ovulate like the firt month I tried cuz I test every day after my period until I got my other period and than started testing again and than sawn my positive one and IM PREGNANTTT! We're so happy since we've been trying for 3 years and a miscartiage during. So happy that now a baby it's on the way!!
customer_reviews.author: Raybelis

customer_reviews.title: Great product. No need for more expensive opks!
customer_reviews.text: These work great!!! Purchasing more expensive ovulation predictor kits is completely unnecessary. Save yourself some serious cash by going with this product. The accuracy of these test strips has been confirmed multiple times by formal progesterone tests after ovulation (or lack thereof, in my case). Just make sure you read the included directions regarding how to interpret results. Two lines does NOT automatically equate to a positive LH surge. People who have left negative reviews probably didn't read the instructions. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Comparatively....garbage
customer_reviews.text: I used these for over a week and was getting very obvious positive signs that I was ovulating, after multiple days of seeing two dark lines, I decided to go to the drug store and buy cvs ovulation strips and clear blue to compare. Both cvs ovulation and clear blue said I was not ovulating but these continued to read false positives. I am not foreign to ovulation test, I used them with my first pregnancy and would never buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: nikkibella

customer_reviews.title: Work well!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous I wouldn’t be able to read when I was ovulating from different reviews, but it’s very clear when I get a positive test. The line is clearly as dark as the control line when it’s positive. I’ve been using them for a few months now and after 4 months of using them I’m getting positive pregnancy tests. Would definitely recommend these! Just read the instructions 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, easy to use, and clear to read
customer_reviews.text: This is my second box. At first I tried to use these and I was having trouble understanding what peak looked like, because unlike a pregnancy test (positive or negative lines) these show darker or lighter depending on where you are in the cycle. As soon as I saw a ‘peak’ test I understood and I will be prepared for next cycle. Also, after reading others recommendations I think if I used them more often - everyday outside of ‘prime time’ and then multiple times a day during the window it would be more accurate. Great product. I have not had any invalid. All were good tests. So far I am happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: User Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awful test! I tested twice with the same urine and got different results! I’ll never order these again.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Coldren

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Work. Test Strip Results Varied with Same Urine Sample.
customer_reviews.text: I've used these in the past, and they seemed to work well, however, this time around, they varied vastly among the same urine sample. I've attached two pictures - the first was from 3 tests from the same urine on Saturday, and the second picture show 3 test strips from the same urine on Sunday. This left me questioning which strips were accurate and whether I was ovulating or not. I ended up having to go out and buy a different brand from Walgreens and think I may have missed the ovulation window this cycle.
customer_reviews.author: AShoemaker

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Price
customer_reviews.text: The box was super cute before my puppy decided to take it outside and spread my ovulation tests all over the yard 🤦🏼‍♀️ Tests still work great tho. It can be difficult to tell the lines on tests like this but I felt like it was pretty obvious when it was positive and I confirmed with a digital test. Much more affordable than digital tests when you’re testing twice a day for weeks every single month like I have to since my cycle is inconsistent.
customer_reviews.author: KatieT

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!! It shows positive even when tested with water and husbands urine.
customer_reviews.text: It was working fine, since last week it’s been showing 2 lines, and I thought it was weird. Well, today I told my husband to do it one to see if this thing was messed up or what. So every single one I do it shows two lines, like I’m ovulating and even the one my husband did shows 2 lines. So it’s not working at all. Even when testing using water is showing 2 lines. Some of the stripes did work, but now, every single one we use we are having problems. So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Taciani Jones

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not one to write a review but I wanted to let anyone who is ttc and been having a hard time doing so do not use this product I gave it two months and both months I ended up with the same result positive for several days even right after af I thought something was wrong with me I went to the doctors and she suggested trying a different product I did and got pregnant within weeks ..I will not post the product I used but I will say it is a Amazon product
customer_reviews.author: Louis sypher

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: I tried getting pregnant for about 3-4 months before I started to try these. I thought I was tracking my ovulation correctly, but I was very wrong! My cycle is abnormal so I ovulated quite a few days before I thought I would. There was a clear spike for about 24 hours. We tried the night of the spike and the two nights that followed, and a few weeks later had a positive pregnancy test. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Makela

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: While taking a hormone balancing supplement I wanted to use some tests to confirm my cycle was balancing out. I had a box of another mix expensive brand last month but couldn’t fathom spending that amount every single month. These are so much more affordable for the amount you get. They’re extremely accurate for me I used a left over more expensive one to confirm ovulation after these showed up positive and it was correct.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: The most important thing to remember when using these is that you won’t see any changes in the two little lines UNTIL your LH surge. My cycle was way off and I tested (per the suggestion of an app I was using) for almost a week before I saw anything change.. my ovulation was clearly way off track and these helped to figure that out. Once the lines changed it was very obvious. While I hope to not have to use these again next cycle (fingers crossed) I highly recommend these for anyone trying to track down their cycle... they are accurate and a fantastic price.
customer_reviews.author: NicciThinks

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and affordable
customer_reviews.text: These test are accurate and easy to use. I did 4 stars for easy to read only because digital tests are obviously easier but these are still fairly easy to read. The price is also more affordable than other ovulation tests I’ve used. While it seems silly the fun packaging colors made me smile which in turn gave me a more positive outlook during a frustrating time. Highly recommend and thankful I stumbled across these on my journey
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work. Always comes out positive. :(
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work. It ALWAYS tests positive for me so I had my husband test it and came out positive for him too. My husband isn’t ovulating but according to the test, he is. LOL. Double checked expiration date and it’s not expired either. Waste of my money. :(
customer_reviews.author: MYY

customer_reviews.title: Accurate & Sensitive
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE Pregmate test strips (LH & HCG). They’re accurate, easy to read, and super affordable. I’ve used other brands (Accumed, Easy@Home, CB Digital) and I always come back to Pregmate. I also highly recommend the LH & HCG combo packs! For reference, their HCG strips have caught MULTIPLE positive squinters at HCG levels of <10 (blood test confirmed) which is crazy sensitive. Don’t wait, BUY THESE NOW!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Maybe my boyfriend is has the XX chromosome?
customer_reviews.text: Photo taken was of two test strips. One was mine, one was my boyfriend’s. Considering that he is genetically incapable of producing the hormone, I’m questioning the accuracy of these strips. Expiration is May of next year.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Echerd

customer_reviews.title: Helpful strips
customer_reviews.text: I got these strips to track my cycle and so far I’m happy with the purchase. I feel that they are giving accurate results regarding my ovulation timeframe, though I can’t know for sure yet without actually conceiving. Sometimes the results don’t completely appear within 5 minutes (since it says to view results at the 5 min mark then throw away) but this could easily be user error. I like being able to view the result line in comparison to the control line, as opposed to just a smiley face or yes/no test. That way I can see when I get an almost positive result days before the definite positive. Would buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie C.

customer_reviews.title: Helped immensely when we were TTC!
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed with these little strips -- by using them, I was able to pinpoint our exact date of conception (my doctor was impressed we were spot on!) The fact the strips come in bulk is great, as if you're anything like me you'll start testing several days before your expected ovulation day. Make sure you're reading the results at the correct time for accuracy - as long as you do that, I believe these are a great tool to help you if you're trying to conceive.
customer_reviews.author: borderrat906

customer_reviews.title: They're the best!
customer_reviews.text: I was using a slightly cheaper brand before I tried these pregmate strips and I went 3 cycles without ever getting a positive. And I followed the directions to a T. Having heard good things about this brand, I decided to give them a try. I have received very clear positive results every cycle I've used them. They are much wider than the other brand I tried and are so much more accurate. I recommend this brand to everyone I know who is looking to track their ovulation.
customer_reviews.author: Cody McK3on Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Hard to read
customer_reviews.text: They work, that’s not the issue. The strips are easy to read if the lines are noticeably different. However, for the past 13 days looked to be the same color. I thought they were positive and was panicking because I thought there was something wrong. I contacted the manufacturer and sent pictures of my strips, and the manufacturer told me they were negative. So I was stressed for nothing. I’m going to continue to use these, but also purchase the more expensive ones with the smiley face. If I think I have a positive, I’m going to double check with one that’s easier to read.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: The accuracy is very low. Using ovulation tests is not very accurate in general compared to other methods, but this particular brand is very inaccurate. It never shown me two stripes - I was taking it every day Just as an experiment. The brand I used before was much better. After buying this brand I stopped using ovulation tests and started using other ovulation tracking methods that I read in books on female health (like ‘taking charge of your fertility’, “beyond the pill” and others. There are plenty of them)
customer_reviews.author: Sofia

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for women TTC
customer_reviews.text: I am over 35 and have been ttc for 7 months without success before my Kaiser obgyn suggested I purchase ovulation strips. After using these strips for 9 days, I realized that I had been timing my ovulation days completely wrong due to my irregular periods! I had been only relying on an app that calculated the "normal" amount of days after the start of your period to determine fertile days. Now using these strips and being more in tune with my body, I now am more accurate with my fertile window. I highly recommend these for women ttc, especially those with irregular menstrual cycles like me. They are so affordable too!
customer_reviews.author: FiftyFour

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time reviewing a product! I told myself that if I got pregnant from this product I would write a review. I got pregnant the first time after using it!! I'm really happy I chose this one instead of a high tech one like the Clearblue ovulation digital test. At first I was a little inpatient because I wasn't getting the solid red line, but it turned out I just ovulate really late. I ended up having a positive test 23 days after my period. I think this is a really good product if you are trying to conceive, and it definitely takes the guesswork out of it!
customer_reviews.author: Maria C

customer_reviews.title: Accurate!
customer_reviews.text: I have PCOS, and my cycles are longer, but fairly regular. I bought these because I’ve been having a hard time conceiving and have no clue if/when I’m ovulating. I’ve been using an app to track my cycle with no luck. I finally got a positive several days after the app said I should have ovulated. I also confirmed with ClearBlue. These actually gave me a positive about 12 hours before ClearBlue did. The ClearBlue is much easier to read but way too expensive to use regularly.
customer_reviews.author: S Moore

customer_reviews.title: I won't be switching brands again!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried 3 different brands of OPK test strips before and none of them detected my LH surge. I was ready to go see a doctor thinking that maybe something I wrong with me. But decided to test one other brand before I make an appointment. I'm so glad I did! For the first time, I can finally detect my LH surge and I'm getting positive OPK results! Will not be switching brands again.
customer_reviews.author: DHK

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use and Easy to Read
customer_reviews.text: These predictor strips are very easy to use and to read. The directions provided are clear, and it has a nice guide for figuring out when to start testing in your cycle. My wife and I use IUI, so it's really important to be able to tell if I'm ovulating a day, or several days, early or late, and these tests provide just that. One other nice thing I've noticed is that there is a distinct difference on these tests between positive and not positive. I've never had a test where I wasn't certain how to read it. Would definitely suggest these over the much more expensive versions.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Masters

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and helped conceive my baby
customer_reviews.text: I started using in December and I found out I was pregnant in February. I used these test strips in the early evening every day (5-6pm) after my period. Cycle days were dead on each month with test strips. I deleted all my ovulation apps after buying this bc they couldn’t compare in accuracy and were just making me feel stressed when my ovulation wasn’t matching. I would highly recommend to anyone trying to conceive. It is worth a try and you get lots of strips in a box! Good luck!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Melo

customer_reviews.title: Inline with my ultrasound
customer_reviews.text: I love these cheap and easy to use test strips. You literally have a picture drawn for you so look at the directions and look at your test strips. I been using these through my entire cycle since they are so cheap why not. I also am going through fertility treatment and saw that I was about 2 days from ovulating and the test strips were right in line with my ultrasound. Excellent product, I recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly accurate! Got pregnant on the first try!
customer_reviews.text: So, I have an app on my phone that tells me when is my ovulating week and since we decided to try to get pregnant I told my husband let me get these strips to confirm the accuracy of my app. I peed there the first n second day n it was negative n on the third day it gave me a positive, we tried and this thing worked! One week later I took a pregnancy test n I was pregnant! Now I have a full box left lol
customer_reviews.author: i3auer

customer_reviews.title: Learning Curve to Reading Them, But Accurate Nonetheless
customer_reviews.text: These work as advertised. There is a learning curve to read the tests accurately. You might have a tendency to interpret negative results as positive (because with HCG tests you can accept even a faint line as positive). However, these are different and the test line has to be as dark or darker than the control line. Once you get confident in reading them, these tests become easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny S

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy using these strips
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy these ovulation strips. They're easy to use and read. They're occasionally a little off on accuracy but that can happen with any tests. I also like the fun packaging, it makes the fertility process seem less sterile and serious. There's also a lot of great instructions so you don't feel like your guessing if you're doing it right.
customer_reviews.author: Coty Smercina

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product! My husband and I were in our TTC journey in November. The first month, we guessed ovulation date using an app. The second month, I bought these to find out my ovulation window along with using an app. Then 2 weeks later we took a positive HCG (also pregmate brand). This product is reliable. I would recommend to anyone TTC, download a good family planning app (Glow, Eve, etc.) and buy these ovulation strips. You will learn so much about your body!
customer_reviews.author: MLN

customer_reviews.title: Indicator okay
customer_reviews.text: The indicator could have been a little more clear, or I could have read the directions better the first time. I thought I had a positive on first use, but went back to check the indicator key and realized there is a small difference the the negative and positive colors. They get you the information you need. The packaging is a little extra, so if you are environmentally conscious you may feel some pangs of guilt every morning with the trash you throw away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer - Amy

customer_reviews.title: Reliable way to predict ovulation
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been seeing a fertility specialist because I have PCOS and have very irregular cycles. I bought these to test for ovulation when going through a clomid cycle to compare with my bloodwork. They were spot on. In the picture, the one with the strongest line (3rd down - marked with ** by the date) was taken the day our doctor told us to try based on bloodwork done in the office. We have yet to see if we got pregnant but these are definitely reliable in predicting ovulation.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first but based on the high reviews I decided to give it a try. I started testing a few days before my normal ovulation cycle period and I kept the steps to compare the differences day by day. I definitely saw an increase in the test line once and I also used the clear blue test for comparison. When the line was dark, indicating a positive result, my clear blue test also gave me a smiley face.
customer_reviews.author: LY

customer_reviews.title: My favorite ovulation tests
customer_reviews.text: I use these every cycle. I usually test in the morning because I drink so much water everyday. They are easy to read as long as you read them during the time frame. I use the app Premom to help me tell of the tests are positive. I like them way more than other tests I have used and they are way more affordable then the flashing smiley faced ones.
customer_reviews.author: melanie

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to anyone TTC!
customer_reviews.text: I was tracking my basal body trmpature for 4 Months with no luck, I turned to OPKs and tried these out starting on cycle day 9. Within 12 days from my peak ovulation I had a positive pregnancy test! Highly recommend to anyone and they are a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn Dean

customer_reviews.title: Expected more with such great reviews, but the lines are incredibly hard to ...
customer_reviews.text: Expected more with such great reviews, but the lines are incredibly hard to tell the difference from a negative vs a positive. Sometimes the stick wouldn't even read anything. You have to hold it in for like 5 sec vs the 3 on the box as stated. Spend more for something that works.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I started using these about one month ago and I really like them. they’re easy to use, instructions are clear and results seem accurate based on my body. I will definitely continue using these until I get pregnant. The only downside is it doesn’t come with anything to pee in so just make sure you have plastic cups at home!
customer_reviews.author: Cott Fam

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use, great price point, worked like a charm!! I had previously used a more expensive brand that was 2x as much for only 10 test strips. I felt like I couldn't accurately tell when I was ovulating because I was worried about using them. Purchased these and was able to test daily around when I suspected to be ovulating. As the day got closer, the lines were more defined! Easy and accurate! I was pregnant within 2 months of using them! Highly recommend instead of spending the higher price for less tests.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: These are consistent!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried sooo many OPKs during my TTC journey. This brand has been the only one that’s been consistent. I feel like I’ve become an expert reading these, but I was able to lock down ovulation while being on my first round of clomid. I got a BLAZING positive when I tested, and did the clear blue digital to make sure which read peak. I’m very pleased with these and will continue to use throughout my ttc journey!
customer_reviews.author: Linsay C.

customer_reviews.title: New tests Not Accurate!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these a couple months and have not had any issues. Until recently, they changed their design and the newer ones are Blue instead of Pink on the label (see picture). These two tests are from the same urine and provided completely different results. The pink LH test from pregmate shows I have a LH surge, the newer blue ovulation test shows I am low fertility. What is going on Pregmate?
customer_reviews.author: Liana

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Bad Packaging
customer_reviews.text: For my first order I ordered the box of 100 and I was completely satisfied, tests were easy and accurate. For my second order I ordered 50 and they come tightly *stuffed* in a small soft packet. Many of the tests in the set of 50 are damaged because of this. The lines are spotty when they should be solid because they’ve been dented from being smushed together, which is really annoying especially since I log my tests in the Premom app and this damage sometimes makes them unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected, good value sized package
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, straightforward LH hormone detection strips. If you need a lot of them (particularly if you have long & irregular cycles) this particular pack is a very good value. Would say accuracy is always going to be a little less than when you use digital test. But this will help you get a good idea of your more fertile days.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Herres

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: So I got these Ovulation test strips and I must say they are easy to use!. The strips are individually wrapped and are not complex to use or to read. I sure hope these help me in TTC for tracking myself. I highly recommended and will continue using them in my journey.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Careful of bad batches / not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I got two different batches of lh strips. Not sure which batch (may be both?) are defective? These were both taken at the same time. One is positive and the other is negative. Frustrated as I have been using this to time my best chances of getting pregnant. I thought I was ovulating late, turns out the tests were inaccurate and I’ll have to try again next month.
customer_reviews.author: LJS

customer_reviews.title: It was spot on!
customer_reviews.text: Due to my extremely irregular cycles clear blue digital was impossible to afford to track ovulation. Thank god i bought this because it is cheap and just found out that it is accurate too with ease to read. I would highly recommend it . It was spot on and helped me track my ovulation. Once i realized that my ctrl line and test line are similar i decided to double check it with clear blue digital one and i was so happy to see smily on it.
customer_reviews.author: Shikha

customer_reviews.title: I got pregnant on the first try!
customer_reviews.text: I planned to start using these monthly and tracking the results when we started trying but we got pregnant on the first try! I also used an app called "Flow" that I monitored my period for months with. It gives you about a two week window of when you have a chance to get pregnant, so we tried every other day during that window plus more when I got a positive test strip.
customer_reviews.author: Calla Lea Zongol

customer_reviews.title: Not pregnant yet but these strips work well
customer_reviews.text: I am using a Clear Blue Easy fertility monitor and for the past few months it had been unpredictable. I bought these strips to make sure the monitor wasn't missing my peak days. I used these test strips for my last cycle and they were easy to read. I had not question on what day was positive. I would recommend them. They are affordable for such a large amount that I could test twice a day if I wanted to.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Cass

customer_reviews.title: Individually wrapped tests that have a few years until expiration.
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Individually wrapped tests. I have had really bad luck with ovulation tests not surging positive in the past and I have heard nothing but great things from a few Pregmate users and am looking forward to finding out myself in a few weeks when I can use them! Edit: I used them they appear to work fast and well! I'm just waiting for that positive surge!
customer_reviews.author: Shades of Cyan

customer_reviews.title: They are definitely accurate!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these when I first got my IUD removed. I didn’t know if I would ovulate the first month but wanted to try and see. I ended up ovulating and these worked really well helping me to figure it out. I’m not pregnant yet, but at least I know I’m ovulating!
customer_reviews.author: Brett & Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: Constantly dark lines
customer_reviews.text: These tests showed positive multiple times in one cycle, several days apart. The line was always dark, all cycle long.
customer_reviews.author: JH87

customer_reviews.title: So adorable and accurate!
customer_reviews.text: These strips are far more accurate than the clear blue strips. I have PCOS & I test regularly throughout my cycles. I usually ovulate anywhere between CD 20-28, so using 3-4 daily isn’t a struggle with $$ because they’re so affordable and 100% accurate. They’ve gotten me pregnant a few times!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen B

customer_reviews.title: So helpful
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have been trying for two years with zero luck. We used the strips ONCE, and I’m now 8 months pregnant. Can not recommend enough. Very insightful
customer_reviews.author: destamb2712

customer_reviews.title: Pregnant within 3 months of using these!
customer_reviews.text: Tried other OPKs from Amazon and were possibly missing the mark because of them - or maybe it just wasn’t our time. In any case, I bought Pregmate in April and we’re now 5 weeks pregnant! It’s July 7th as I’m writing this. Very easy to use, obviously they were accurate, easy to read because it’s wider than others, and the instructions inside were also helpful. Overall probably the best quality OPKs available on Amazon. Buy these! One last thing, we baby danced every other day in between my period (but waiting 3 days after period ended) and I think that really helped us to conceive. Most importantly, lots of prayer and faith in God!
customer_reviews.author: Forloveandlemons33

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and great value!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been going on 11 years of trying to conceive and after spending so much on treatments, medications, tests this is a great value. I went through maybe 4 cycles with 1 box. I have PCOS and I’m very irregular and I love that I don’t feel like I’m wasting the tests or spending so much money as I would if purchased at a drug store. My positive tests were very dark and there was no question about it.
customer_reviews.author: VANESSA REYES

customer_reviews.title: Faulty strips.. do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I got a faulty bag of strips. It showed that I was ovulating for 12 days straight! So my next cycle I used 2 other brands and these were giving me false positives. So frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad kit. Easy to use. Decent to read.
customer_reviews.text: The strips are easy to use, second line isn’t always easy to tell if it’s positive or not, but usually strong when it’s most likely positive. Better strips than others I have bought which were harder to tell even when it was positive. Generally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: Innacurate
customer_reviews.text: I used the strips and believed I was ovulating due to the strips on 6/28. I used the strips again on 7/9/19 and it still shows ovulating. I used a tested the strips again on 7/11/19 with water and it came back as not ovulating. I tested a strip with water and a little apple juice and it shows ovulating. This strips do not work.
customer_reviews.author: Genette

customer_reviews.title: Very Acccurate love them
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand it's way more sensitive than clear blue digital it always always for months now I get a positive one day before clear blue can even pick up my surge hands down these are the most accurate best trustworthy strips on the market I got pregnant using theseawww
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Loved Product
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have been trying for our third and final baby and had been trying for four months. I decided to get the strips and use the app Femometer to track my LH levels. The strips along with the app is awesome. We used it during two cycles and I found out I’m pregnant this week. I would recommend it to those who haven’t had fertility issues in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Calbrity82

customer_reviews.title: LH defection was accurate
customer_reviews.text: Trying to make a little human and these strips are great. The quantity for the price and the accuracy is great. I tested my LH surge and tried on another brand to make sure it was right. I highly recommend this product. Sending positive thoughts and vibes to anyone trying!
customer_reviews.author: Burk

customer_reviews.title: Bette than anything else I’ve used!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Pregmate brand OPKs - they are wider than the wondfo strips I used to use and are much easier to read and scan into my app. I think they are cheaper too. I know this doesn’t matter at all but I love the packaging. Testing over and over again can get tedious but having the bright package to look at while I wait for my results cheers me up.
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: Hasn't worked yet
customer_reviews.text: Read all of the reviews carefully. I don't think any of them mention weather or not the women who used them actually got preganat. I've been trying to get pregnant for almost a year and have been using this for three months with no success. Can't say I would recommend this bargain product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work in progress
customer_reviews.text: We are a young couple who have been trying for a few months now with no results. I was using an ovulation tracker app. However with these test strips we found out that my ovulation was a little later than the average predicted one. I was finally able to figure out my ovulation cycle and fingers crossed for the best!
customer_reviews.author: AllNewIdeas

customer_reviews.title: Always Showed Positive
customer_reviews.text: These showed positive for ovulation for 3+ weeks solid vs the 2-3 days they should have. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: It really works!!
customer_reviews.text: Beyond happy with this product! We tried other from Walmart and would try on the days it said to but 8 months later still nothing... then trying this product on the first try we got pregnant I am now 22 weeks! I’ve already recommended it to my sister who will be trying after her wedding! Once you get the hang of the strips and how your cycle looks on them it’s perfect! I’d start testing right after your period that way you don’t miss it my app even told me I wouldn’t ovulate for a few more days but when I tested it I was ovulating! If you are struggling please try this!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brad and Marissa

customer_reviews.title: They give you false positives
customer_reviews.text: They do not work! Literally all my tests came back positive! My husband even took one and that one came back positive.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Dosmar

customer_reviews.title: These strips really do predict ovulation
customer_reviews.text: These work as expected. Test in the morning and afternoon until you get a positive. You can see from my pic that my strips definitely got darker when I peaked, then for good measure I took another the day after peak to show the line getting lighter.
customer_reviews.author: kp

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This product showed 6 days of ovulation. I started using the Target brand tests to compare and these tests are wrong. I’ve started reading closely the other reviews and I see I am not the only one that has encountered this. Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: CMI

customer_reviews.title: THEY WORK. Be patient.
customer_reviews.text: After I got off birth control, I had no idea where I was with my cycle. I began testing myself WAY too early and was starting to get irritated that the tests were always negative. Then on the exact day I was predicted to ovulate with my app, I got a positive LH test. And then another. And they kept getting darker. These are great for the money and I will definitely be ordering another box
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: A good at-home option to understand your cycle
customer_reviews.text: Pregmate ovulation test strips were easy to use and helpful in understanding my cycle while trying to conceive. At first I used them alone, but they were at times difficult to read/gave confusing results. So I found that testing first thing in the morning when urine is strongest after sleeping provided the most accuracy. Later in our journey, I combined these test strips with measuring basal body temperature daily, as well as tracking my cycle in an app like Flo to get the bigger picture. Still have not achieved our pregnancy goal, but will keep trying (and using the strips) until we do! :)
customer_reviews.author: Claire Faughnan

customer_reviews.title: False positives
customer_reviews.text: Too many false positives!!!! I was positive one day and negative the next? I used these to get pregnant the first time, but it looks like I’ll have to switch brands, because these don’t work!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Orland

customer_reviews.title: Accurate when they work.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to buy accurate ovulation tests in bulk without having to spend an arm and a leg. These seem to be accurate, when they work. I’d say that 1 in 4 are duds and won’t work (I test the same way every time). They do accurately track LH surges. Since they aren’t digital, they can be kind of hard to read. I recommend using an app that you can upload the picture to for reading and tracking.
customer_reviews.author: Keyleigh

customer_reviews.title: Easy and cheap!
customer_reviews.text: These ovulation test strips are so easy to use and SO much cheaper than the over the counter tests. Between these pregmate ovulation tests and an ovulation tracking app, I could pinpoint the day of ovulation easily. I just finished my first box and was very pleased with the product, wouldn’t change a thing about them.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Pritt

customer_reviews.title: Hard to read but generally accurate
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered these before, years ago, and I think those were better than this most recent order. It used to be very easy to read the strip and clearly see when the line was darker. With the box I just bought, I’ve now used it for two cycles. The strips never got to the point where the line was clearly as dark as the control line. It looked ALMOST as dark, but not exactly as dark. So I wasn’t 100% sure if the strip was positive but was able to confirm using an app that predicts my ovulation date and testing at least once a day during my fertile window.
customer_reviews.author: MKR

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: My wife was coming off of birth control and wasn't sure how regular she'd be and never knew exactly when she ovulated. We didn't see the LH surge the first cycle we tried, but this could be because she was still coming off birth control, and we weren't following the directions perfectly. The following month, we made sure to follow the directions as written and these ovulation tests helped us know when it was the right time to make sure we tried during the time range. A few weeks later we found out we were pregnant! We're so thankful we found these!
customer_reviews.author: Seth M.

customer_reviews.title: Our first month "really" trying.....
customer_reviews.text: Tests seem to work as described. This is our first month "really" trying and I found these test strips were easy to use. I tried to test at the same time daily and when the strips darkened, I began testing twice a day. We are hopeful! Also, I read other reviews of similar products and decided to do my own experiments just to make sure the strips tested correctly such as; dipping a strip into water, which came back negative. LOL Overall, I'm satisfied with the product!
customer_reviews.author: A. Raether

customer_reviews.title: Very affordable way to time ovulation
customer_reviews.text: Once you get used to using test strips, it'll be hard to go back to paying high prices for digital ovulation kits. Just wait for the strip to develop and you'll know the results in minutes. The lines are very clear. I usually take a picture of the strip every day during my window to see the progression of the LH surge line.
customer_reviews.author: teebeemee

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Great accuracy! You get a second line most of the time but when your have a surge it’s a dark dark pink line. Got pregnant our 2nd surge!
customer_reviews.author: Kori Borns

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I am assuming they are accurate. I used them for a few months and while I have not gotten pregnant yet, they still seem to be telling me when my surge is. With some reading of instructions and trial and error, they are simple to use. The biggest tip I have is to go find one of the apps that let you add a picture of the strips. It helps calculate the ratio and you can easily store and review past tests all in one place for easy reference.
customer_reviews.author: Ann H.

customer_reviews.title: New to testing
customer_reviews.text: I’m new to testing strips, I was used to clear blue but they can be pricey. I was using these to try to help me track ovulation. I haven’t had a real cycle since I came off birth control last October. Sometimes I have line eyes. So I’d think I’d have a positive but was really a negative. I’ve been using for maybe 2 months now and haven’t had a positive. Could possibly just my body. But I did get another brand of test and they seem to be similar so it could be working. I just have to keep testing.
customer_reviews.author: Dazja Campbell

product_meta.title: PREGMATE 50 Ovulation Test Strips Predictor Kit (50 Count)
feature_bullets: Over 99% accurate at detecting your LH surge.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
